text: The Provincial Assembly of the Punjab is a unicameral legislature of elected representatives of the province of Punjab, which is located in Lahore in eastern Pakistan.Provincial Assembly of the Punjab The Assembly was established under Article 106 of the 1973 Constitution of Pakistan as having a total of 371 seats, with 66 seats reserved for women and eight reserved for non-Muslims. == References == Category:Punjab (Pakistan)
title: Member of the Provincial Assembly of Punjab
